p.s: You are the love of my life and my soul!
I recievedreceived your sonnet you wrote about me and I'm absolutely thrilled but also sad and worried.
I have to see that you wrote the poem in such a beautiful way.
I know that time is not in our best interest but I am fully convinced that I would love towards each other is stronger than any boundless sea!
Time is cruel and it is a curse but my darling, the sun as you wrote me will never die and cannot be destroyed.
It is immortalized on paper and time will not change that.
I felt your honest emotions anand believed every word.
I will always remember you, not only due to our relation but also due to your art of writing.
Shakespeare, you are an extraordinary and revolutionary poet, playwright and businessman.
The way you can describe what others feel is a talent not everyone has.
You really understand the human soul and your themes are timeless.
The way you create idioms and words is unbelievable.
The audience and readers can relate to every topic you mention in your work.
Believe me, you help people understand love and hate and jealousy and greed... We are so influenced by your work!
Sonnet 65 is very meaningful to me and describes all of my thoughts.
And remember, our mortality does not effectaffect our love because our love will never die!
